summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 22.202.040, 22.202.060, 22.202.070, 22.208.050, and 22.208.060 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Housing Code (Ordinance 106319), Sections 2.02, 5.05, and 5.06) to revise the procedures for appeals from orders of the Director of Construction and Land Use issued under Section 22.208.040.
